# Factur-X Engine (v1.3)

> Self-hosted API for EN 16931 / ZUGFeRD 2.4 / Factur-X invoicing.

## Documentation Map

- [README (Main)](README.md): Technical Overview, Quickstart, and FAQ.
- [Community Edition](README_COMMUNITY.md): Detailed Community features.
- [Pro Edition](README_PRO.md): Pricing, SLA, and Enterprise features.
- [CRA Compliance](docs/cra.md): EU Cyber Resilience Act statement.
- [Docker Hub](DOCKER_HUB_README.md): Container usage and environment variables.

## Key Capabilities

- **Generation**: PDF/A-3 creation with embedded XML.
- **Validation**: EN 16931 and XRechnung 3.0 compliance via Schematron.
- **Extraction**: Unifying Factur-X/ZUGFeRD XML into standard JSON.
- **Security**: Stateless, Air-gapped, Read-Only container.
